actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Referring the bill (H.R. 1108), entitled "For the relief of Francisco Rivera and Alfonso Calderon", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers a private relief bill (H.R. 1108) to the chief judge of the U.S. Court of Federal Claims with instructions to report back to the House of Representatives.

titles.title: Referring the bill (H.R. 1108), entitled "For the relief of Francisco Rivera and Alfonso Calderon", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
